statements: SELECT country_name, total_population FROM VaccinationCoverage;
SELECT coverage_rate, vaccinated_population FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE total_population > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE country_name='USA';
SELECT country_name, last_update_date FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE coverage_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY coverage_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(coverage_rate) AS average_coverage FROM VaccinationCoverage;
SELECT * FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE coverage_rate > 80 ORDER BY last_update_date DESC
SELECT country_name, vaccinated_population, coverage_rate FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE total_population > 1000000 ORDER BY coverage_rate DESC
SELECT country_name, total_population, coverage_rate FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE vaccinated_population < total_population * 0.5 ORDER BY total_population ASC
SELECT country_name, vaccinated_population, coverage_rate FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE coverage_rate < 70 AND last_update_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT country_name, total_population, vaccinated_population, coverage_rate, last_update_date FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE vaccinated_population > total_population * 0.8 ORDER BY country_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Vaccination_Coverage
SELECT country_name, coverage_rate FROM Vaccination_Coverage ORDER BY country_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Immunization_Gaps WHERE gap_status = TRUE
SELECT gap_description, country_id FROM Immunization_Gaps ORDER BY country_id ASC
SELECT country_name, last_update FROM Vaccination_Coverage WHERE coverage_rate > 80
SELECT country_name, coverage_rate FROM Vaccination_Coverage WHERE country_id = 1
SELECT country_name, last_update FROM Vaccination_Coverage WHERE coverage_rate > 80.00
SELECT country_name, coverage_rate FROM Vaccination_Coverage ORDER BY coverage_rate DESC
SELECT country_name, COUNT(gap_id) AS total_gaps FROM Vaccination_Coverage LEFT JOIN Immunization_Gaps ON Vaccination_Coverage.country_id = Immunization_Gaps.country_id GROUP BY country_name
SELECT country_name, gap_description FROM Vaccination_Coverage INNER JOIN Immunization_Gaps ON Vaccination_Coverage.country_id = Immunization_Gaps.country_id WHERE Immunization_Gaps.gap_status = true
SELECT * FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE country_name = 'USA';
SELECT country_name, coverage_rate FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE coverage_rate > 80 ORDER BY coverage_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImmunizationPrograms WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM ImmunizationPrograms ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT gap_description FROM CoverageGaps WHERE country_name = 'France';
SELECT * FROM VaccinationCoverage WHERE coverage_rate > 80 ORDER BY country_name ASC
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM ImmunizationPrograms WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT MAX(coverage_rate) AS max_coverage_rate, MIN(coverage_rate) AS min_coverage_rate FROM VaccinationCoverage
SELECT country_name, COUNT(gap_id) AS total_gaps FROM CoverageGaps GROUP BY country_name HAVING total_gaps > 5
SELECT country_name, AVG(coverage_rate) AS avg_coverage_rate FROM VaccinationCoverage GROUP BY country_name ORDER BY avg_coverage_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM VaccinationCenters;
SELECT center_name, location FROM VaccinationCenters ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT VaccineRecords.record_id, VaccineRecords.vaccine_name, VaccinationCenters.center_name FROM VaccineRecords INNER JOIN VaccinationCenters ON VaccineRecords.center_id = VaccinationCenters.center_id;
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM VaccineInventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM VaccinationCenters ORDER BY center_name DESC, center_id ASC;
SELECT center_name, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM VaccinationCenters vc JOIN VaccineRecords vr ON vc.center_id = vr.center_id GROUP BY center_name;
SELECT p.patient_name, v.vaccine_name, vi.manufacturer FROM Patients p JOIN VaccineRecords vr ON p.patient_id = vr.patient_id JOIN VaccineInventory vi ON vi.vaccine_name = vr.vaccine_name;
SELECT * FROM VaccineRecords WHERE vaccination_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY vaccination_date DESC;
SELECT vc.center_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inventory FROM VaccinationCenters vc JOIN VaccineInventory vi ON vc.center_id = vi.vaccine_id GROUP BY vc.center_name;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC
SELECT center_name, location FROM vaccination_centers WHERE center_id = 1
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer FROM vaccines WHERE dose_required = 2
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT vaccination_date FROM vaccination_records ORDER BY vaccination_date DESC
SELECT * FROM vaccination_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC, center_id
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 18 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT center_name, location FROM vaccination_centers WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT MAX(dose_required) AS max_dose_required FROM vaccines

SELECT patient_name, vaccine_name, vaccination_date FROM patients JOIN vaccination_records ON patients.patient_id = vaccination_records.patient_id JOIN vaccines ON vaccination_records.vaccine_id = vaccines.vaccine_id
